segments.text: I can't believe what's happening in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, but the woman keeps drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely unaware of the water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the side, a boy's balancing on a shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, hand outstretched for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing feels like it's about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the doorsâ€”such a shock.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden; what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the kids to be so bold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate in her hand looks perfectly clean amid chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is full of unexpected little disasters.
segments.speaker: PAR
